html:
CONFIDENTIAL
THE NHIF - HEALTH PROVIDER IN/OUT PATIENT CLAIM FORM
Appendix X
Form NHIF 2A & B
Regulation 18(1)
AuthorizationNo {{ doc.authorization_no }}
Serial No:
{{ doc.folio_no }}

A: PARTICULARS
{{ doc.company }}
{{doc.patient_name }}
{{ doc.date_of_birth }}
{{ doc.gender }}
{### {{frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "area")}} ####}
{% set add_details = frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, ["p_o_box", "street"]) %} {{ add_details[0] }} {{add_details[1]}}
{{ doc.cardno }}
{{doc.attendance_date}}
{{ doc.patient_type_code }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Practitioner", {"practitioner_name": doc.practitioner_name}, "department") }}
{{ doc.patient }}
{{ doc.authorization_no }}

Diagnosis Code

Provisional Diagnosis {% for item in doc.nhif_patient_claim_disease %} {% if item.status == "Provisional" %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Disease Code Description
{{item.disease_code }} {{item.description }}
Final Diagnosis {% for item in doc.nhif_patient_claim_disease %} {% if item.status == "Final" %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Disease Code Description
{{item.disease_code }} {{item.description }}

B: Details / Cost of services

{% set total = [0] %} {% for item in doc.nhif_patient_claim_item %} {% set total = total.append(total.pop() + item.amount_claimed) %} {% endfor %}
Sr Ref DocType Item Name Item Code Item Quantity Unit Price Amount
{{ loop.index }} {{ item.ref_doctype | replace(" Prescription",":") }} {% if item.ref_doctype == "Drug Prescription" %} {% set drug = frappe.db.get_all("Drug Prescription", {"parent": item.patient_encounter, "name": item.ref_docname, "drug_code":item.item_name, "drug_name": item.item_name}, ["dosage", "period", "dosage_form"]) %} {{item.item_name}}, {% if drug %} {% if drug[0]["dosage"] %} Dosage: {{ drug[0]["dosage"] }}, {% endif %} {% if drug[0]["period"] %} Period: {{ drug[0]["period"] }}, {% endif %} {% if drug[0]["dosage_form"] %} Form: {{ drug[0]["dosage_form"] }} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% else %} {{item.item_name}} {% endif %} {% if item.approval_ref_no %} {{ item.approval_ref_no }} {% endif %} {{item.item_code }} {{item.item_quantity }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.unit_price, currency="TZS", precision=2) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount_claimed, currency='TZS', precision = 2) }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(total[0], currency="TZS", precision = 2) }}

C: Clinician Information

{{ doc.practitioner_name }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", {"practitioner_name": doc.practitioner_name}, "tz_mct_code") }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value( "NHIF Physician Qualification", frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", {"practitioner_name": doc.practitioner_name}, "nhif_physician_qualification"), "qualification") }}
{{ frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", {"practitioner_name": doc.practitioner_name}, "mobile_phone") }}
{% set signature = frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", {"practitioner_name": doc.practitioner_name}, "doctors_signature") %} {% if not signature %} {% set signature = frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", "Direct Cash", "doctors_signature") %} {% endif %}

D: Patient Certification:

I certify that I received the above named services.
{{ doc.patient_name }}
{{doc.telephone_no }}

E: Description of In/Out-patient Management / any other information

Date of Attendance: {{doc.attendance_date}}

Clinical Notes

{{ doc.clinical_notes }}

F: Claimant Certification:

I certify that I provided the above named services
{{ frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Practitioner", {"user_id": doc.modified_by}, "name") }}
{% if doc.company == "Shree Hindu Mandal Hospital - Dar es Salaam" %} {% elif doc.company == "Shree Hindu Mandal Super Specialized Polyclinic - Kunduchi" %} {% endif %} 		{% set signature = frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Practitioner", {"user_id": doc.modified_by}, "doctors_signature") %} {% if not signature %} {% set signature = frappe.db.get_value( "Healthcare Practitioner", "Direct Cash", "doctors_signature") %} {% endif %}

NOTE:

Patient should sign the form after completion of service
Before referring patient to other facility, referring facility should be satisfied for the missing item and its alternative within the facility.
Any falsified information may subject you to prosecution in accordance with NHIF Act No. 8 of 1999.
name: NHIF Form 2A & B V2
